CppAD
-----

Description:
   Given a C++ algorithm that computes function values, CppAD generates an algorithm that computes corresponding derivative values (of arbitrary order using either forward or reverse mode). 

Website:
   `https://www.coin-or.org/CppAD/ <https://www.coin-or.org/CppAD/>`__ 

License:
   CppAD is freely available with either the `Eclipse Public License Version 1.0 <https://opensource.org/licenses/EPL-1.0>`__ , or the `GNU General Public License Version 3.0 <https://opensource.org/licenses/AGPL-3.0>`__.
